languages.text: {n}Один из слуг Омниссии бросает исполненный муки взор на вас. Его голос дрожит от ужаса.{/n} "Нечестивые духи забрались под нашу кожу, в наше священное железо. Заберите Движущую силу наших тел, молю. Мы не желаем оскорблять Омниссию святотатством, что творят наши руки".

traits.locale_text: {n}Один из слуг Омниссии бросает исполненый муки взор на вас. Его голос дрожит от ужаса.{/n} "Нечестивые духи забрались под нашу кожу, в наше священное железо. Заберите Движущую силу наших тел, молю. Мы не желаем оскорблять Омниссию святотатством, что творят наши руки".

languages.text: {n}One of the servants of the Omnissiah casts a tortured glance at you, his voice trembling with horror:{/n} "Blasphemous spirits have crawled under our skin and into our sacred iron. Take the Motive Force of our bodies, I implore you. We do not wish to offend the Omnissiah with the sacrileges our hands are committing."
languages.original_text: {n}Один из слуг Омниссии бросает исполненный муки взор на вас. Его голос дрожит от ужаса.{/n} "Нечестивые духи забрались под нашу кожу, в наше священное железо. Заберите Движущую силу наших тел, молю. Мы не желаем оскорблять Омниссию святотатством, что творят наши руки".

His voice is trembling with horror.{/n} "Blasphemous spirits have crawled under our skin and into our sacred iron. Take the Motive Force of our bodies, I implore you. We do not wish to offend the Omnissiah with the sacrileges our hands are committing."

Take the Motive Force of our bodies, I implore you. We do not wish to offend the Omnissiah with the sacrileges our hands are committing."

Take the Motive Force of our bodies, I implore you. We do not wish to offend the Omnissiah with the sacrileges our hands are committing."

{n}One of the servants of the Omnissiah casts a tortured glance at you, his voice trembling with horror:{/n} "Blasphemous spirits have crawled under our skin and into our sacred iron. Take the Motive Force of our bodies, I implore you. We do not wish to offend the Omnissiah with the sacrileges our hands are committing."

languages.text: {n}Einer der Diener des Omnissiah wirft dir einen gepeinigten Blick zu. Seine Stimme zittert vor Entsetzen.{/n} "Blasphemische Geister sind unter unsere Haut und in unser heiliges Eisen gekrochen. Entfernt die Antriebskraft aus unseren Körpern, ich flehe Euch an. Wir möchten den Omnissiah nicht durch die Sakrilege beleidigen, die unsere Hände verüben."
languages.original_text: {n}One of the servants of the Omnissiah casts a tortured glance at you, his voice trembling with horror:{/n} "Blasphemous spirits have crawled under our skin and into our sacred iron. Take the Motive Force of our bodies, I implore you. We do not wish to offend the Omnissiah with the sacrileges our hands are committing."

traits.locale_text: {n}Einer der Diener des Omnissiah wirft dir einen gepeinigten Blick zu. Seine Stimme zittert vor Entsetzen.{/n} "Blasphemische Geister sind unter unsere Haut und in unser heiliges Eisen gekrochen. Entfernt die Antriebskraft aus unseren Körpern, ich flehe Euch an. Wir möchten den Omnissiah nicht durch die Sakrilege beleidigen, die unsere Hände verüben."

languages.text: {n}L'un des serviteurs de l'Omnimessie vous lance un regard torturé et sa voix tremble d'horreur.{/n} « Des esprits blasphémateurs se sont infiltrés sous notre peau jusqu'à notre fer sacré... Je vous en conjure, prenez la Force Motrice de nos corps. Nous ne voulons aucunement offenser l'Omnimessie par les sacrilèges que nos mains nous font commettre. »
languages.original_text: {n}One of the servants of the Omnissiah casts a tortured glance at you, his voice trembling with horror:{/n} "Blasphemous spirits have crawled under our skin and into our sacred iron. Take the Motive Force of our bodies, I implore you. We do not wish to offend the Omnissiah with the sacrileges our hands are committing."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'un des serviteurs de l'Omnimessie vous lance un regard torturé et sa voix tremble d'horreur.{/n} « Des esprits blasphémateurs se sont infiltrés sous notre peau jusqu'à notre fer sacré... Je vous en conjure, prenez la Force Motrice de nos corps. Nous ne voulons aucunement offenser l'Omnimessie par les sacrilèges que nos mains nous font commettre. »

languages.text: {n}其中一位欧姆尼塞亚的仆人向你投来痛苦的目光。他的声音因恐惧而颤抖。{/n}“那些亵渎的灵魂已经渗入了我们的皮肉，浸入了我们的圣铁之中。我恳求你，终止我们体内的源力。我们不想触怒欧姆尼塞亚，不希望犯下亵渎的罪行。”
languages.original_text: {n}One of the servants of the Omnissiah casts a tortured glance at you, his voice trembling with horror:{/n} "Blasphemous spirits have crawled under our skin and into our sacred iron. Take the Motive Force of our bodies, I implore you. We do not wish to offend the Omnissiah with the sacrileges our hands are committing."

traits.locale_text: {n}其中一位欧姆尼塞亚的仆人向你投来痛苦的目光。他的声音因恐惧而颤抖。{/n}“那些亵渎的灵魂已经渗入了我们的皮肉，浸入了我们的圣铁之中。我恳求你，终止我们体内的原初动力。我们不想触怒欧姆尼塞亚，不希望犯下亵渎的罪行。”

languages.text: {n}万機神の従者のひとりがこちらに苦悶の視線を投げる。男の声は恐怖で震えていた。{/n}「神に背く精霊が我々の皮膚の下を這い、神聖な鉄の中に入り込んできた。頼む、この体の動力を受け止めてくれ。この手が犯す罰当たりな行為で、万機神の怒りを買いたくはないのです」
languages.original_text: {n}One of the servants of the Omnissiah casts a tortured glance at you, his voice trembling with horror:{/n} "Blasphemous spirits have crawled under our skin and into our sacred iron. Take the Motive Force of our bodies, I implore you. We do not wish to offend the Omnissiah with the sacrileges our hands are committing."

traits.locale_text: {n}万機神の従者のひとりがこちらに苦悶の視線を投げる。男の声は恐怖で震えていた。{/n}「神に背く精霊が我々の皮膚の下を這い、神聖な鉄の中に入り込んできた。頼む、この体の動力を受け止めてくれ。この手が犯す罰当たりな行為で、万機神を怒らせたくはない」

languages.text: {n}Uno de los siervos del Omnissiah te lanza una mirada atormentada. Su voz tiembla de miedo.{/n} «Espíritus blasfemos se han metido bajo nuestra piel y en nuestro hierro sagrado. Saca la Fuerza Motriz de nuestros cuerpos, te lo suplico. No queremos ofender al Omnissiah con los sacrilegios que estamos cometiendo».
languages.original_text: {n}One of the servants of the Omnissiah casts a tortured glance at you, his voice trembling with horror:{/n} "Blasphemous spirits have crawled under our skin and into our sacred iron. Take the Motive Force of our bodies, I implore you. We do not wish to offend the Omnissiah with the sacrileges our hands are committing."

traits.locale_text: {n}Uno de los siervos del Omnissiah te lanza una mirada atormentada. Su voz tiembla de miedo.{/n} «Espíritus blasfemos se han metido bajo nuestra piel y en nuestro hierro sagrado. Saca la Fuerza Motriz de nuestros cuerpos, te lo suplico. No queremos ofender al Omnissiah con los sacrilegios que estamos cometiendo».

languages.text: {n}Hermesih'in hizmetkârlarından biri, acı içinde sana bakıyor. Konuşurken sesi korkuyla titriyor.{/n} "Kâfir ruhlar, derimizin altına yerleşip kutsal demirimize sızdılar. Devinim Gücü'nü vücudumuzdan çekip al, yalvarırım. Ellerimizin hürmetsizliği yüzünden Hermesih'i gücendirmek istemiyoruz."
languages.original_text: {n}One of the servants of the Omnissiah casts a tortured glance at you, his voice trembling with horror:{/n} "Blasphemous spirits have crawled under our skin and into our sacred iron. Take the Motive Force of our bodies, I implore you. We do not wish to offend the Omnissiah with the sacrileges our hands are committing."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hermesih'in hizmetkârlarından biri acı içinde sana bakıyor, konuşurken sesi korkuyla titriyor.{/n} "Kâfir ruhlar, derimizin altına yerleşip kutsal demirimize sızdılar. Devinim Gücü'nü vücudumuzdan çekip alın, istirham ediyorum. Ellerimizin kast ettiği bu saygısızlık sebebiyle Hermesih'e karşı günaha girmek istemiyoruz."
